room_title: Escape room "Sweet Escape" by Every Second Counts ESC in Beaufort (SC)
room_description:
This Room is a real treat! 
On a summer vacation to Big Rock Candy Mountain while visiting Sugar Falls...
you find yourself locked in a candy shop known to have the sweetest of treats.

Being locked in a candy shop is every kidâ€™s dream until there is a storm of the century where the town could be lost forever.
Will you and your friends be able to figure a way out of this Sticky Situation.
